Docs.summary: Defines the interface for Xamarin.Forms XAML markup extensions.

remarks.para: Types implementing this interface can be used as custom XAML markup extension.
remarks.example:
The markup extension can be used directly in XAML
<Label TextColor="{localns:ColorMarkup R=100, G=80, B=60}"/>
